scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w=api" "npm run dev -w=dashboard" "npm run dev -w=build-service" "npm run dev -w=reverse-proxy"
scripts.build: npm run build -w=api && npm run build -w=dashboard && npm run build -w=build-service && npm run build -w=reverse-proxy
scripts.test: npm run test -w=api && npm run test -w=dashboard && npm run test -w=build-service
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w=api && npm run lint -w=dashboard && npm run lint -w=build-service && npm run lint -w=reverse-proxy
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run db:push && npm run docker:up
scripts.clean: npm run docker:down && rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules
